title: Xazyd Wier

properties.name: description
properties.value: Xazyd Wier was a Zarosian warlock, who resided somewhere around Kharyrll in the early Third Age. He managed to flee, when Kharyrll was overrun by Zamorakians. Wier fled into the forest and managed to find shelter by a hollow tree near the town Flamtaer.

content:
Xazyd Wier was a Zarosian warlock, who resided somewhere around Kharyrll in the early Third Age. He managed to flee, when Kharyrll was overrun by Zamorakians. Wier fled into the forest and managed to find shelter by a hollow tree near the town Flamtaer.

This article is a stub.
A stub is an article which does not cover all information available about the topic. You can help by expanding it.
rawContent:
'''Xazyd Wier''' was a [[Zaros]]ian warlock, who resided somewhere around [[Kharyrll]] in the early [[Third Age]]. He managed to flee, when Kharyrll was overrun by [[Zamorak]]ians. Wier fled into the forest and managed to find shelter by a hollow tree near the town [[Flamtaer]].
